Christ sees the termination of the conflict. The battle is waging more and more fiercely. Soon He will come whose right it is, and will take possession of all earthly things. All the confusion in our world, all the

violence and crime, are a fulfillment of the words of Christ. They are signs of the nearness of His coming.--Letter 264, 1903.
